Params: {2: 'Snow', 3: 'Bianca, my child, do not be upset.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Miyi has finished his purpose, he came back, and he protected the bag till the very end.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: "It's still not enough, is it, my child?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'There are young mothers and infants here looking for shelter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Father, I have a question. God said to love people and your enemies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "If I can't love the enemies because of the people I love...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'You mean... the mechanoid, right? My child.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The death of Miyi... I still... cannot forgive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Father, I want to take everyone outside.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Father! What's wrong? Did you give all your food away again...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: '...Bianca... You have always been a gentle, yet strong and brave child...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You should be able to reach the Southern Diocese. There should be an army stationed there... There will be a way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...Father, do you plan to stay here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'I... must stay here, I must stay here, by myself...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: "To guard this church... This...... It's my choice. It's my faith, Bianca.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Snow', 3: 'Lead people to where God can see, I will pray for you here, for everybody.', 4: '2'}
